tags: None
review:
She is an Angel I can say, a God Sent Person, A Good Human Being. 

I met her in the Brahmshakti hospital Delhi and I really recommend her to all who need a Best Doctor who listen to them and then provide the best treatment. 
the moment I met her I was at ease that now I am in safe hands. I met a lot of doctors during my Gynec. Problem but none has the time to listen the entire history and they just want to mint Money but after meeting Dr Jyotsna Gupta One meets the Real Doctor who remember the Oath which all doctors take but only few remember that through out their lives. She not only listens patiently but Provides the best Treatment as well. She narrates the entire procedure to the patients (which not many doctors does), She put you at ease Like a Friend and not only during your treatment she remains there but even after the treatment she is available to Help you if needed. 

I met one more gynecologist prior meeting Dr Jyotsna Gupta that Gynec   said first I will do the D&C and take a small tissue  sample and then send it to lab that after getting the report we will see the report than  we will plan the 2nd D&C in which I will clean the entire uterus lining  and both the time she was charging nearly Rs18000/-per D&C, But on Meeting Dr.Jyotsna Gupta she explained that there is no need to do D&C twice, I will clean the entire lining at first which is required why to give you trouble financially and as well physically. she said that in your case the entire lining should be remove. so it was an eye opener for me because as a patient I was not aware of all this, Thank God I met Dr.Jyotsna Gupta and she saved me from 2 procedures, she is the Best Gynec. In Delhi according to my experience. She remained in touch through out till my recovery and after the D&C she assured me that on seeing the content before sending for the biopsy that  it seems everything is normal and no need to worry about any thing (those words provided me the peace of mind because the first gynec was scaring me with the chances of some disease. 

even though I got this procedure done by her in the month of September 2015 I am in  touch with her till date. and She is always there to Guide me whenever I need her help.

Thanks a lot Doctor, Really Appreciate Your Expertise :)

And one important thing about her is that She does a lot for the society and does a lot of social work and Won many awards from many societies (PVT and as well Govt) which we come to know through Newspaper's Articles few months back. one can very well search the net for that to know her achievements.

So Ladies if you really want a Good Experienced  Doctor who listen to your medical problems like a Friend as well I will definitely recommend Dr.Jyotsna Gupta to all.

Stay Blessed Doc

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am here to share my feedback towards Dr.Jyotsna..as I approached her 3yrs back when I was confirmed that I am conceived, based on her guidance I proceeded with the further steps and now I have a baby with 2.7yrs..recently I was suffering from a continues bleeding for a month..first I visited to my physician she referred to  gynaec..she prescribed tab trapic for bleeding stop..but didn't work later she referred for a Lab test and advising saying that you need to undergo for D&C procedure..I was not happy my the approachment and guidance by her..after coming home I started to get connected with Dr.Jyotsna.. now finally i felt that i approached Jyotsna at the right time and happy with the guidance and by her prescription..within a day my bleeding stop and continuing the treatment as advised me to continue..I highly recommend for the people who all facing the same issue or any gynaec related issue..don't think twice go with Dr.Jyotsna Gupta..she is good, supportive that also extreme support over call too and based on your health issue exact solution you will get..she is too patiency and allow you to speak up with your issue..that is a big sign of a doctors...listen first the issue or history then go with the prescription...thank you for this wonderful opportunity...

tags: None
review: Very nice doctor... No words for her... She is next to god really... Very patiently she listens to problems and genuinely advise.... Has lots of patience... Even if you ask silliest question she will answer... I would definitely recommend this doctor to everyone
